geo_id.Description: Combined state (2-digit) + county (3-digit) FIPS codes + '000000' for tracts
geo_id.Source(s): U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates

geography_name.Source(s): U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 ACS 5-Year Simplified Geography Files

rural.Description:
Rural/urban status 
"Rural" indicates county is wholly contained in a rural area; "Not rural" denotes otherwise.
rural.Source(s): Digital Equity Act definition of "rural areas" applied to 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates.

county_tot_pop.Source(s): U.S. Census Bureau, Population Estimates Program, Vintage 2019 County and Puerto Rico Municipio Population Estimates

tot_cov_pop.Description: 2019 Total covered populations in county (population with 1 or more of the eight characteristics that make up the total covered populations as defined by the Digital Equity Act of 2021)
tot_cov_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2019 Modeled Total Covered Population Estimates.
Small area model of total covered populations derived from 2019 ACS 1-Year file, Vintage 2019 County and Puerto Rico Municipio Population Estimates, 2010 Decennial Census, 2015-2019 ACS 5-Year file, 2017 Program for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC) Household file and 2012/2014/2017 PIAAC State and County Small Area Estimates of Adult Skills on Literacy and Numeracy from the National Education Center for Education Statistics.

pct_tot_cov_pop.Description: 2019 Percentage of county population in total covered populations
pct_tot_cov_pop.Source(s): U.S. Census Bureau, 2019 Modeled Total Covered Population Estimates

tot_cov_pop_MOE.Description: 2019 Total covered populations in county (population with 1 or more of the eight characteristics that make up the total covered populations as defined by the Digital Equity Act of 2021) margin of error
tot_cov_pop_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2019 Modeled Total Covered Population Estimates.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

pct_tot_cov_MOE.Description: 2019 Percentage of county population in total covered populations margin of error
pct_tot_cov_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2019 Modeled Total Covered Population Estimates.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

ipr_pop.Description: 2015-2019 County household population in "covered households" (living in households with income-to-poverty ratio no more than 150 percent of federal poverty threshold)
ipr_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates.
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_ipr_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of household population in "covered households" in county (living in households with income-to-poverty ratio no more than 150 percent of federal poverty threshold)
pct_ipr_pop.Source(s): U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates

ipr_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 County household population in "covered households" (living in households with income-to-poverty ratio no more than 150 percent of federal poverty threshold) margin of error
ipr_pop_MOE.Source(s):
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_ipr_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of household population in "covered households" in county (living in households with income-to-poverty ratio no more than 150 percent of federal poverty threshold) margin of error
pct_ipr_MOE.Source(s): Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level

aging_pop.Description: 2015-2019 County population age 60 years and older
aging_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S0101: Age and Sex

pct_aging_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population age 60 years and older
pct_aging_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S0101: Age and Sex

aging_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 County population age 60 years and older margin of error
aging_pop_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S0101: Age and Sex.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

pct_aging_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population age 60 years and older margin of error
pct_aging_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S0101: Age and Sex.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

incarc_pop.Description: 2015-2019 County population incarcerated in a state or local correctional facility
incarc_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates.
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_incarc_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population incarcerated in a state or local correctional facility
pct_incarc_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates.
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

incarc_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 County population incarcerated in a state or local correctional facility margin of error
incarc_pop_MOE.Source(s):
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level. 
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_incarc_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population incarcerated in a state or local correctional facility margin of error
pct_incarc_MOE.Source(s):
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level. 
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

vet_pop.Description: 2015-2019 County veteran population age 18 years and older
vet_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table B21001: Sex by Age by Veteran Status for the Civilian Population 18 Years and Over.

pct_vet_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population who are veterans aged 18 years or older
pct_vet_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table B21001: Sex by Age by Veteran Status for the Civilian Population 18 Years and Over. 
County resident population.

vet_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 County veteran population age 18 years and older margin of error
vet_pop_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table B21001: Sex by Age by Veteran Status for the Civilian Population 18 Years and Over. 
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

pct_vet_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population who are veterans aged 18 years or older margin of error
pct_vet_MOE.Source(s): Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level

dis_pop.Description: 2015-2019 County population with one or more disabilities
dis_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates.
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_dis_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population with one or more disabilities
pct_dis_pop.Source(s): U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates

dis_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 County population with one or more disabilities margin of error
dis_pop_MOE.Source(s):
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level. 
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_dis_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population with one or more disabilities margin of error
pct_dis_MOE.Source(s): Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level

lang_barrier_pop.Description: 2015-2019 County population with a language barrier (Speaks English less than "very well" or has low levels of literacy)
lang_barrier_pop.Source(s):
Derived from 2015-2019 ACS 5-Year file (for speaks English less than "very well") and 2017 Program for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC) Household file and 2012/2014/2017 PIAAC State and County Small Area Estimates of Adult Skills on Literacy and Numeracy (for low literacy) from the National Center for Education Statistics. 
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_lang_barrier_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population with a language barrier (Speaks English less than "very well" or has low levels of literacy)
pct_lang_barrier_pop.Source(s): Derived from 2015-2019 ACS 5-Year file (for speaks English less than "very well") and 2017 Program for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC) Household file and 2012/2014/2017 PIAAC State and County Small Area Estimates of Adult Skills on Literacy and Numeracy (for low literacy) from the National Center for Education Statistics

lang_barrier_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 County population with a language barrier (Speaks English less than "very well" or has low levels of literacy) margin of error
lang_barrier_pop_MOE.Source(s):
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.
Margin of error accounts for sampling error in the ACS but not the uncertainty introduced by the low literacy imputation.
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_lang_barrier_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population with a language barrier (Speaks English less than "very well" or has low levels of literacy) margin of error
pct_lang_barrier_MOE.Source(s):
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.
Margin of error accounts for sampling error in the ACS but not the uncertainty introduced by the low literacy imputation.

lang_pop.Description: 2015-2019 County population 5 years and older who speak a language other than English at home and speak English less than "very well"
lang_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S1601: Language Spoken at Home

pct_lang_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population 5 years and older who speak a language other than English at home and speak English less than "very well"
pct_lang_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S1601: Language Spoken at Home

lang_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 county population 5 years and older who speak a language other than English at home and speak English less than "very well" margin of error
lang_pop_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S1601: Language Spoken at Home. 
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

pct_lang_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population 5 years and older who speak a language other than English at home and speak English less than "very well" state margin of error
pct_lang_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates, 
Table S1601: Language Spoken at Home.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

pct_low_literacy_pop_nces.Description: Percentage of county population with low levels of literacy (Level 1 or Below in literacy assessment rubric)
pct_low_literacy_pop_nces.Source(s): National Center for Education Statistics, 2012/2014/2017 Program for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies State Small Area Estimates of Adult Skills on Literacy and Numeracy

pct_low_literacy_nces_MOE.Description: Percentage of county population with low levels of literacy (Level 1 or Below in literacy assessment rubric) margin of error
pct_low_literacy_nces_MOE.Source(s):
National Center for Education Statistics, 2012/2014/2017 Program for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies State Small Area Estimates of Adult Skills on Literacy and Numeracy.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

minority_pop.Description: 2015-2019 County population who identify as a race other than White alone or as Hispanic or Latino of any race
minority_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates,
Table DP05: ACS Demographic and Housing Estimates

pct_minority_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population who identify as a race other than White alone or as Hispanic or Latino of any race
pct_minority_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates,
Table DP05: ACS Demographic and Housing Estimates

minority_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 County population who identify as a race other than White alone or as Hispanic or Latino of any race margin of error
minority_pop_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates,
Table DP05: ACS Demographic and Housing Estimates.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

pct_minority_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population who identify as a race other than White alone or as Hispanic or Latino of any race margin of error
pct_minority_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates,
Table DP05: ACS Demographic and Housing Estimates.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

rural_pop.Description: 2015-2019 County population living in rural areas
rural_pop.Source(s):
Digital Equity Act definition of "rural areas" applied to 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates.
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_rural_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population living in rural areas
pct_rural_pop.Source(s): Digital Equity Act definition of "rural areas" applied to 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates

rural_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 County population living in rural areas margin of error
rural_pop_MOE.Source(s):
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level. 
Estimate is rounded to 4 significant digits.

pct_rural_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population living in rural areas margin of error
pct_rural_MOE.Source(s): Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

pct_no_fixed_bb_pop_fcc.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county population living in places where fixed broadband service delivering advertised speeds of at least 25 Mbps download and 3 Mbps upload is not available
pct_no_fixed_bb_pop_fcc.Source(s): Federal Communications Commission (FCC), Fourteenth Broadband Deployment Report, released January 19, 2021. Appendix D.

no_bb_or_computer_pop.Description: 2015-2019 County household population that lack a computing device and/or broadband subscription
no_bb_or_computer_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates,
Table S2802: Types of Internet Subscriptions by Selected Characteristics

pct_no_bb_or_computer_pop.Description: 2015-2019 Percentage of county household population that lack a computing device and/or broadband subscription
pct_no_bb_or_computer_pop.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates,
Table S2802: Types of Internet Subscriptions by Selected Characteristics

no_bb_or_computer_pop_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 County household population that lack a computing device and/or broadband subscription margin of error
no_bb_or_computer_pop_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates,
Table S2802: Types of Internet Subscriptions by Selected Characteristics.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.

pct_no_bb_or_computer_MOE.Description: 2015-2019 County household population that lack a computing device and/or broadband subscription margin of error
pct_no_bb_or_computer_MOE.Source(s):
U.S. Census Bureau, 2015-2019 5-Year American Community Survey (ACS) Estimates,
Table S2802: Types of Internet Subscriptions by Selected Characteristics.
Margin of error at the 90 percent confidence level.
